title: Content Compass Application - B-Roll Image Prompts
description: 28 image prompts (2 per slide) for B-roll overlays. Created for Jan to generate AI images.

style_notes.aesthetic: Modern, professional, tech-forward, warm and approachable

slides.title: Hi, I'm AppyDave
slides.content_summary: Title slide introducing AppyDave - Context Engineering & AI Mastery

prompts.prompt: A confident tech professional standing in a modern home studio setup with multiple monitors, warm lighting, and a microphone. Clean, professional aesthetic with teal and orange accent colors. Photorealistic style.
Abstract digital compass made of glowing orange and teal circuits and code fragments, floating in a dark professional space. Modern tech aesthetic, cinematic lighting.

slides.title: Who Am I
slides.content_summary: David Cruwys - 35+ years tech, 7-8 YouTube channels, 3 years on Ecamm

prompts.prompt: Timeline visualization showing 35 years of technology evolution - from early computers to modern AI. Split screen effect with vintage tech on left transitioning to modern setup on right. Warm tones, professional.
Grid of YouTube play buttons in different colors representing multiple channels, floating in a teal and gold gradient background. Modern, clean, professional style.

slides.title: The 555 Manifesto
slides.content_summary: 5 Channels x 55 Weeks x 555 Videos - content philosophy

prompts.prompt: Bold typography design showing '555' in a manifesto style, with 5 video icons, 55 calendar weeks, and a counter reaching 555. Orange and gold colors on dark teal background. Motivational poster aesthetic.
Mountain climber halfway up a steep cliff face, looking up toward the summit. Metaphor for ambitious goals. Dramatic lighting with warm orange sunset tones. Cinematic.

slides.title: My Channels
slides.content_summary: AppyDave, AITLDR, VOZ, AppyDave Coding - four channels with different focuses

prompts.prompt: Four distinct video screens arranged in a grid, each showing different content styles: coding tutorial, AI graphics demo, cinematic movie scene, and live streaming setup. Professional multi-screen presentation.
Content creator hub with multiple monitors showing analytics dashboards, video editing software, and live chat. Modern home office with warm accent lighting in teal and gold.

slides.title: What I Build
slides.content_summary: FliVideo, Storyline App, DAM Util, Agent Workflow - four products

prompts.prompt: Modern software dashboard UI mockup showing video asset management interface with drag-and-drop files, timeline view, and transcription panel. Clean design with teal accents.
Interconnected system diagram showing four glowing nodes (representing four products) connected by flowing data streams. Abstract tech visualization with orange and teal energy paths.

slides.title: My Process
slides.content_summary: Plan (POEM) → Record (Ecamm+FliHub) OR Generate (Storyline) → Publish (Agent Workflow)

prompts.prompt: Flowchart visualization showing content creation pipeline: planning board on left, recording studio in middle splitting into two paths (camera and AI generation), merging into publishing automation on right. Clean infographic style.

Split scene: left side shows professional video recording setup with camera and lighting, right side shows AI-generated animated content on screen. Both paths leading to same output. Modern tech aesthetic.

slides.title: Ecamm Is Central
slides.content_summary: 3 years on Ecamm, video editing becomes pre-production, Stream Deck workflow

prompts.prompt: Professional streaming setup featuring Ecamm Live interface on main monitor, Stream Deck with glowing buttons in foreground, high-quality microphone and camera visible. Warm studio lighting with teal and orange accents.
Close-up of hands on Stream Deck pedal, with motion blur suggesting quick tap actions. Recording studio background softly blurred. Professional product photography style.

slides.title: My Reality
slides.content_summary: Last 4 months travel, zero videos, finally shipped 80-hour project

prompts.prompt: World map with flight path lines connecting Philippines, Australia, USA, and Thailand. Airplane icons along route. Travel journey visualization with warm vintage map aesthetic and modern overlay.
Before/after split: left shows empty video timeline with zero uploads, right shows completed project with full timeline and celebration confetti. Contrast visualization. Clean UI style.

slides.title: The Gap
slides.content_summary: I know what to do. I need go-getters passionate about the journey.

prompts.prompt: Group of diverse content creators working together around a shared table, laptops open, engaged in collaborative discussion. Warm, inviting workspace with plants and natural light. Community feel.
Bridge spanning a gap between two cliffs - one labeled 'KNOWING' and one labeled 'DOING'. Person walking across. Inspirational metaphor visualization with dramatic lighting.

slides.title: What I Need
slides.content_summary: Bi-weekly check-ins, small group, public commitment, fellow builders

prompts.prompt: Calendar with bi-weekly meeting blocks highlighted in orange, video call icons on alternating weeks. Clean planning visualization with checkmarks and progress indicators.
Small group video call grid showing 6 people engaged in discussion, each in their own creative workspace. Warm, supportive atmosphere. Professional yet friendly.

slides.title: What I Bring
slides.content_summary: Context engineering, systems thinking, tools to share, 35+ years shipping

prompts.prompt: Toolbox overflowing with digital tools and frameworks - code snippets, workflow diagrams, automation gears. Gift box style opening with tools floating out. Generous sharing metaphor.
System architecture diagram showing interconnected nodes representing context engineering concepts. Clean technical diagram with flowing connections in teal and gold colors.

slides.title: 2026 Goal
slides.content_summary: Master AI Agents & Context Engineering for Content Creators

prompts.prompt: Futuristic vision board for 2026 showing AI agent interfaces, content creator tools, and mastery badges. Vision board collage style with aspirational energy. Orange and gold tones.
Teacher at a digital whiteboard explaining AI concepts to engaged students/creators. Knowledge transfer moment. Warm educational setting with modern tech elements.

slides.title: Why I Love Ecamm
slides.content_summary: 30-second vertical video CTA with QR code

prompts.prompt: Smartphone displaying vertical video content with play button, surrounded by heart and fire emojis. Social media vertical format showcase. Modern, energetic, youthful.
QR code transforming into a play button with energy rays emanating outward. Call-to-action visualization. Clean tech aesthetic with orange and teal glow effects.

slides.title: Let's Do This
slides.content_summary: CTA - Q1:Habits → Q2:Voice → Q3:Case Study → Q4:Solo, APPYDAVE.COM

prompts.prompt: Four stepping stones crossing a stream, each stone labeled Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4 with icons for habits, voice, case study, solo. Journey progression visualization. Inspirational nature meets tech.
Handshake between two creators with digital overlay showing connection. Partnership and collaboration. Warm professional lighting with Content Compass colors (teal, orange, gold).
